instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00850 lid senor issue
threads.message: Hi ive got an 820-00150 that came in totally dead , (charger faulty) had to replace 4 usb controllers and isl9240 , now board working apart from if you close the lid the laptop will not wake the screen, same on battery power or mains power , you have to hold your finger on the power button to force off then power on again and screen will display , even if you tell the laptop to turn off , wait for it to shut down then close the lid and try to turn on , no display again, would it be u6650 as this looks like it controls both left and right smc lid sensors, or am i in the complete wrong place ?

threads.title: 820-00850 lid senor issue
threads.message: Check SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT signals reaction at J4800/01, when lid is closed/open.
